content: -Zunpretty=thir-tree landed on master today, so I was wondering if a full THIR pretty-printer (akin to the HIR pretty-printer) would be interesting also
To clarify, what I mean by "a full pretty-printer" is something that would output Rust-looking code but with all the THIR desugaring
I feel like it would be interesting yeah
@Camelid I left an example output in the PR (#82860)
It's basically the Debug output of the THIR data structures, like -Zunpretty=hir-tree does
